title: Undertone - Offline Whisper AI Voice Recognition
description: Undertone is an offline voice recognition system. Enhance your game with 99 languages, translation, efficient performance, and cross-platform compatibility for immersive player experiences.
longDescription:
Introducing Undertone, an offline voice recognition asset for UE. With Undertone, you can add high-quality, offline voice recognition to your games, creating more immersive and engaging experiences.


Trailer


Documentation | Support | Discord



Key Features:



  • 🌍 99 Languages: One model file supports 99 languages, making your game accessible to players worldwide.


  • 🗂️ Small File Size: At just 77 MB, Undertone is efficient without compromising on performance.


  • 📴 Fully Offline: Undertone runs completely offline on your computer or phone, ensuring voice recognition is available anytime, anywhere, without relying on an internet connection.


  • 🎯 Accurate Recognition: Undertone offers top-notch accuracy in voice recognition for better user interaction.


  • ⚡ Fast Performance: Coded in C++, Undertone is highly efficient and keeps up with demanding gameplay.


  • 🌐 Translation Support: Undertone can translate to English, making it easier to adapt your content.


  • 🎮 Cross-Platform: Undertone works seamlessly across various platforms and devices.


Upgrade your game development process with Undertone's offline voice recognition capabilities. Get started with Undertone today and elevate your project.



For any questions or concerns, our dedicated support team is always ready to help at help@leastsquares.io or at the discord.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 🌍 99 Languages: One model file supports 99 languages, making your game accessible to players worldwide.
  • 🗂️ Small File Size: At just 77 MB on the smallest model, Undertone is efficient without compromising on performance.
  • 📴 Fully Offline: Undertone runs completely offline on your computer or phone, ensuring voice recognition is available anytime, anywhere, without relying on an internet connection.
  • 🎯 Accurate Recognition: Undertone offers top-notch accuracy in voice recognition for better user interaction.
  • ⚡ Fast Performance: Coded in C++, Undertone is highly efficient and keeps up with demanding gameplay.
  • 🌐 Translation Support: Undertone can translate to English, making it easier to adapt your content.
  • 🎮 Cross-Platform: Undertone works seamlessly across various platforms and devices.


Code Modules: (Please include a full list of each Plugin module and their module type (Runtime, Editor etc.))

  • Neural (Runtime)
  •  Undertone (Runtime)
  •  UndertoneEditor (Editor)
  •  UndertoneManagement (Editor)


Number of Blueprints: 2

Number of C++ Classes: 24

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: macOS, Linux, Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: macOS, Linux, Windows, iOS, Android
